Reviews.Title: “I LOVE this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: aroehrig
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Orchid Key twice now, and each time has been so wonderful! The staff is extremely friendly, the rooms are clean and modern, and the pool is great! I love grabbing a drink at their bar by the pool during happy hour. Unless you need to be on the beach in Key West, you can't stay at a nicer place. I have nothing bad to say about the Orchid Key!

Reviews.Title: “amazing surprise”
Reviews.Author: JOHN364
Reviews.Content: my boyfriend and i stayed at the orchid key inn one night out of pure luck. we went to key west on spring break without a single hotel booked or anything planned. While walking down duval street we noticed that the orchid key inn had vacancy so we decided to check it out. Turns out we got the last room available. It was amazing! Very clean and super cute! Kim, the women working the front desk at the time was amazing. She was so helpful in such many ways. If we wanted to do something she would call for us and make arrangements. We also loved that fact that when you would check into the inn that they would provide you with a complimentary drink. The pool and spa were again very clean and always stocked with towels. The cont. breakfast was up to par. We both fell in love with this place so much that we tried to book another night here but unfortunately it was full. We have already talked about returning to Key west but now we will call and reserve in advance to make sure we stay at this wonderful place! ENJOY :)

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL”
Reviews.Author: Alan S
Reviews.Content: Although expensive, this is a great little oasis off the main street in the old town. Everything's within walking distance. Hotel has lovely rooms, a nice pool and patio bar. Great staff.

Reviews.Title: “Fun for locals too”
Reviews.Author: Pete J
Reviews.Content: I'm a Key West local, and always refer out of town guest to Orchid Key for a place to stay. But on a day off, I always make sure to stop and have a glass of vino with Betty the bartender. I work in the hospitality industry and have for decades, and never have I encountered a bartender that does what she does. Knowledgable on cocktail mixology, and people skills that manages to bring total strangers together, who end up feeling as though they've just made new friends. Stay there if you can, but even if you don't, still check out their lounge. It quaint, quiet, tasteful, and best of all there's Betty!

Reviews.Title: “Hidden little gem!!”
Reviews.Author: ATandSC
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last week on a wedding planning trip to Key West...Just wanted to check things out before our return trip in August. This place is everything it shows online and more! The front desk is absolutely wonderful...We arrived early and were able to check in and get some great Key West tips and directions. Our room was very lovely...the right tropical decor but still modern and sleek. The pool was very quiet and relaxing, Everyone on the property was wonderful and the poolside bar hosted a happy hour every evening! The continental breakfast very substantial, plenty of choices and everything that we ate was very good! We cant wait to come back for our August Wedding and Honeymoon!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: mks2008
Reviews.Content: My wife and I went to Key West in May of 2011 and stayed at the Orchid Key. We loved our stay and how personal the experience was while there. It is in a great location where it is far enough away from the noise, but within a 5-10 minute walk to where all the fun is. We enjoyed being able to spend time at the pool, but still being able to feel like we were secluded from the rest of the town. The happy hour beer was a nice way to start the night. It was a great experience and we will look to stay there again when we return to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Ama12
Reviews.Content: I loved the orchid key inn, even though is in Duvall the area is very quiet. The hotel is very modern and charming at the same time, very clean and good service. They have a small bar in the side of the pool, and a little jacuzzi next to it. The shower faucets are awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: “Don't let the address put you off this is a delightful spot.”
Reviews.Author: HamishToronto
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights, at first Iwas worried about the location on Duval St but a combination of the distance from the rowdy bars and the clever use of water features and vegetation blocked out the noise. The room was lovely very tastefully decorated, a bit small, there was nowhere to sit and read. It was chilly when we were there so I read in my fleece at the pool. Breakfast was uninteresting. The staff were very helpful with suggestions about outings and restaurants. It was expensive but very pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Did not experience the Value I expected”
Reviews.Author: Isabel51
Reviews.Content: Pros: + Location toward the Atlantic end of Duval Street: quieter than the other end; + Attractive pool area; + Updated rooms. Cons: - Price of room vs. size of room: Manhattan prices and smaller than Manhattan room size in standard King room (from what I understand, the suites are more reasonably sized, but most of the rooms are standard); Also: Expedia lists a price on your room charges that DOES NOT INCLUDE ADDITIONAL TAX OF 12.5%. - Pool is small & unheated; - Bed linens: I don't know what they are thinking with the extremely heavy comforters & duvets - Room Temperature controls are very confusing: We left our air conditioning on, but every night our bed still ended up feeling damp with humidity - Breakfast is not very good: Most chain hotels do better than this these days. The only protein was hard boiled eggs & the fruit was canned peaches or bananas, apples, & oranges that mostly didn't look in good of shape - Service: We DID NOT experience good service: Charged $6 (supposedly half price) for second glass of house wine during Happy Hour. I complained to manager about charge and he shrugged his shoulders. "Appetizers" are cheese and crackers. Our room was not ready when we arrived & we were told we would be called when it was ready, but we weren't. With one exception, the staff was not very friendly or helpful. - Obviously, it's not on the water and has no view of the water.

Reviews.Title: “great service”
Reviews.Author: exptrave101
Reviews.Content: I recently took a group to Key West and we stayed at the Orchid Key. The hotel was lovely, the staff was good and the rooms were great. We had a rude encounter with an employee, mentioned it and it was immediately corrected. I recommend this place for anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Would definately stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: bodaciousbodi
Reviews.Content: I was kindly told when I called to book a girls weekend it is not normally a "straight" choice. Didn't matter or bother us a bit. Great location. Great staff. Great bed, bath and bar! Need I say more for Key West?

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience”
Reviews.Author: jake4056
Reviews.Content: My wife and I needed a quick relaxing getaway and we certainly got what we wanted!! Kim and the staff at the Orchid Key inn came through with flying colors!! My wife and I stayed in the "Honeymoon" suite and we could not begin to describe what fantastic accommodations these were. This was the first time I used tripadvisor to help book a trip. I'll be sure to use it again for my next trip

Reviews.Title: “Return Trip was AMAZING!!!”
Reviews.Author: Trisha W
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to the Orchid Key Inn and we had an AMAZING stay once again. This trip we stayed in a King Suite for 7 nights and it was like staying at home... Very spacious with its own spacious living room area. Brandon at the front desk was very helpful and recommended us to the best eateries in Key West while treating us like royalty. Betty at the Orchid Key Bar was so nice and treated us like family (she even named a drink after my husband for his Birthday). The pool and hot tub were impeccably maintained and ready to relax in after a day of walking the strip. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are seeking Grade A customer service with a high end modern hotel room in the center all the action... Thanks Orchid Key for making our vacation top notch!!! Sincerely, The Weises

Reviews.Title: “"Best Hotel Stay ever after many trips to Key West!"”
Reviews.Author: KateGep
Reviews.Content: I have been to Key west many times before and the Orchid Key is by far the best hotel to stay at. Kim Gerth at the front desk made it the 5 stars for our stay. Her passion for the customers and personal detail to service was exceptional. You would never know you are right on Duval because the pool and landscaping is perfectly tuked in and it is very quit and peaceful. I won't be staying anywhere else after finding this diamond! Can't wait to get back there soon!!

Reviews.Title: “This place is a well hidden gem in the heart of key West.”
Reviews.Author: Nancy S
Reviews.Content: From the individual service to the serene pool setting this place is tops. We received lots of wonderful recommendations from the front office for activities and the daily breakfast spread is over the top as far as "continental" goes. There is a very warm and comfortable vibe here. We loved it so much we are staying an extra night in their sister hotel, The Almond Inn as this place is booked solid!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location in the middle of it all”
Reviews.Author: tobique
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for four days and just loved it. It is right in the middle of old Key West and perfect for walking anywhere. We rented bikes so could also bike if there was a restaurant a little farther which we wanted to visit. The hotel is a fifties style which has been converted to a boutique hotel so because of the era it was originally built, the rooms are fairly small, but you don't want to spend much time in the rooms anyway. Our room had a king bed and a small closet. The bathroom was really new looking with a fabulous shower and great sink area. The hotel rooms surrounded the pool area which was the center of activities, including breakfast and drinks at the bar in the evening. The pool is decent sized, not for swimming laps but great for lounging and cooling off. There is also a jacuzzi on the other side of the patio area. The complimentary breakfast is wonderful with juices, tea, coffee, cereal, fruit, yogurt, Danish, fruit breads and more. It is an extensive and delicious spread. In the evening, there is a bar available and many of the guests can be found talking and enjoying a drink. It is fairly expensive,but honestly, the locations cannot be beat and the staff is wonderful. A wonderful choice if you are in Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: JLBDA
Reviews.Content: What can I say about the Orchid that would sum up what a fabulous place it is. In a word....excellence. My wife and I just returned for another visit and from the moment we arrived, felt like we were home. The staff are SO helpful and the rooms are SO comfortable. We love the loction as you cannot beat walking out your door on to Duval, but you feel like you are miles away when you sit out by their pool and soak in the Key West sun. Anytime we return to Key West, this is where we will stay. Thank you again Orchid staff for making our trip such a wonderful experience. Regards, J Leman (Bermuda)

Reviews.Title: “Only a single night stay...”
Reviews.Author: AlliCurtissM
Reviews.Content: We visited this Inn for one night after getting married and staying at another hotel on Key West the previous 4 nights. We chose the Orchid Key based on reviews and location. The room itself was clean and nicely done up. It was small but that didn't bother us much. It had a strange smell, I'm assuming cleaning products. It was strong enough to make the clothes in our luggage smell. The breakfast was pretty good...for the price we paid I would expect real silverware. Those two things are the only gripes. The location is perfect. It's on Duval but it's far enough south that you can enjoy your sleep. Easy walking distance to most anything. Kim at the front desk was great. She helped with early check in and a little later checkout. The woman working the breakfast was less than thrilled to be there. Overall I think this would be a great place to stay for $75-$100 less than what we paid. Location is not worth THAT much. We received much more for the same amount of money by going further south.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic first time in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: SittinUnderAPalmTree
Reviews.Content: We decided upon the Orchid Key after researching on Trip Advisor. Many places looked nice, but the Orchid Key had a retro, funky vibe that set it apart from the other hotels/inns in Key West. We were extremely happy with our decision; it was fabulous!! ROOM: We had a king room, which was decorated nicely and always clean. The bed was extremely comfortable and had very soft linens. The bathroom was very modern, with a huge shower. The hotel also provides a hairdryer and shampoo/conditioner, body wash, and soap from Bath & Body Works. LOCATION: The location of the hotel is just a bonus as to how nice it is. Being that it is on the corner of Truman and Duval, it is only a short walk in any direction to great restaurants and things to do. We walked EVERYWHERE! Although the hotel is right on Duval, you would never know it. You step off of the street and it's so quiet and peaceful. GROUNDS: The hotel grounds were very pretty with fountains and lush greenery everywhere. The pool and hot tub were very nice and provided a nice relaxing area away from the craziness and crowds of upper Duval street. BREAKFAST: A continental breakfast is served at the Orchid Bar from 7-10am which includes coffee, tea, juices, cereals/milk, hard boiled eggs, fresh fruit, yogurt, pastries, muffins, breads, bagels, English muffins, and french toast. BAR: For a tiny place, the Orchid Bar was sure hopping while we were there! At check-in, the front desk provided us with drink coupons (two for each day we stayed), which were good for a free glass of wine or beer (certain kinds, of course) or 50% off of well drinks during happy hour 5-7pm. Both bartenders, Betty and Michael, were great! (Thanks Michael for the tip on Antonia's... delicious!) During happy hour, the hotel provides a complimentary cheese plate with crackers and vegetables and dip, a very nice touch! Even with all of the other places to stay in Key West, we will definitely stay at the Orchid Key on our next trip back! Thanks for making our first stay in Key West so enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: “A Great Find”
Reviews.Author: Stan F
Reviews.Content: Both Trip Advisor and our travel agent gave us good vibes and we decided to to stay here. On the happenin' corner of Truman and Duval, the front desk, the bar people, the breakfast lady were all sooo friendly and helpful. Rooms were sparkling clean, ours had a very sylish generous size bathroom, huge shower stall, 48" flat screen overlooking the king bed. A little patio with table and chairs turned out to be great for breakfast outside, watching the Duval parde and also for sipping the free wines or cocktail at night. Brandon was the PM desk person, and my advice is to listen to him on restaurants; he is very discerning. We had one recommendation that was not so great, but not from him. Try Nine one Five, about 1/2 block away on Duval, fun place and great food.

Reviews.Title: “â€œNice but really lacking in certain things, not good value for the priceâ€�”
Reviews.Author: malbeck3030
Reviews.Content: Please see the review which has the same heading. I agree with everything said in this review + would add our bed had some plastic type cover on the matress so made it one of the more un-comfortable beds I have ever slept in. Still in the KEYS accomadation is at a premium so I guess they can charge what they like.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Xochitl21
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here several times over the last 5 years. Always good, friendly service. Nice place to stay in Key West. Central, but not loud.

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: 90thandKO
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the Orchid Key Inn pretty late in the evening and Kim at the front desk was waiting for us. She had everything ready and gave us a lovely warm welcome. We dropped our bags in our room and used our free drink coupons at the bar on site. Betty was working the bar that evening and could not have been friendlier or more fun. Betty told us stories about Key West and suggested some other bars to visit. Orchid Key Inn is a small boutique property. While we were there the hotel had no children as guests and this was very nice for us. We like to sit out by a quiet pool and don't care for yelling, running, splashing, etc. The atmosphere was very relaxing. The property is on Duval St, close enough to walk down to the bars but far enough away you don't hear people or music. The street noised is dampened by several well placed water features on property. A real plus for us, the pool and jacuzzi are open 24 hours, they just ask guests to be quiet out of respect for the others staying at the Inn. We were in the jacuzzi spa both nights and it was wonderful. The room has a fridge and robes. The shower amenities are from Bath and Body Works. The towels were nice and fluffy. The sheets were not the softest and the pillows firm, but those are my only and very minor complaints. The staff was extremely customer service oriented and very friendly. They bring you towels when you are out by the pool, they call and confirm reservations, and they pick up your breakfast dishes. The rate includes breakfast each day - items provided included hard boiled eggs, yogurt, fresh fruit, pastries, bagels, toast, coffee, tea, and juice. There is a toaster available as well. Everything is self service. The location is an easy walk to the Hemingway House and the Southernmost area and Mallory Square. There are several very nice restaurants just up the street on Duval. There is a CVS about a block down on Truman for those necessities like water and sunscreen. We would definitely stay at this property again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!!!”
Reviews.Author: WanderingPencil
Reviews.Content: If you scan through the reviews, you'll see many satisfied guests. I'll just add another positive review and rather than write much, I'll just confirm what others had said. Our stay here was very pleasant. Our room was quiet, clean and bright, tastefully decorated in a contemporary fashion, which suited the feel of this older, but nicely rejuvenated small hotel. The bed was very comfortable, just like I was sleeping at home, and the bathroom was nice, with a large glass-enclosed shower, accented with a nice tile treatment. The staff was great and the service was excellent. I would definitely return again, without any hesitation!

Reviews.Title: “Great location on Duval”
Reviews.Author: peamomma
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orchid Key Inn on Duval for 3 nights. It is a great location at the corner of Truman and Duval (but not in the noisy part of Duval). It looks like a former 1950's motel that has been updated. The rooms are small but well appointed. Each room has a refrigerator and microwave. Breakfast and happy hour appetizers are included in the room rate, along with free drink coupons. The staff is very friendly and helpful. On the down side, they need to update the bed linens and pillows (not great quality), and it would be nice to have a full length mirror and a small sofa or chair in the room (they do have a bar stool, but that isn't very comfortable to sit on for long periods).

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: RMCYR
Reviews.Content: We drove down to the Keys from Fort Lauderdale and were very tired. This was the first place we stopped and they had a room for us without a reservation. Great location off of Duval Street. Parking spaces were smaller and they charge $8.00 day to park for guests. They provide happy hour drink specials and a free glass of wine or beer daily. They have a nice continental breakfast too. The pool is small but intimate. The rooms are FANTASTIC! Large king beds, small kitchens, and super large showers. They even had bathrobes in the wardrobe. It was quiet and lovely. The staff was great and willing to help you. We intended to stay one night but opted to stay there for two nights. It is not cheap but it is well worth the cost. I suggest reservations as rooms are limited. There is a hot tub.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place.”
Reviews.Author: Shanshan725
Reviews.Content: I have been to Key West 3 times and have been lucky enough to stay here 2 of the 3 times. Last time we came down to Key West out plane was really late and landed in Miami after Midnight. We drove down to Key West getting there around 4:30 am. We called the Inn and told Brandon what has happening with out nightmare plane trip and he told us to be careful and gave us a number to call so when we got to the Inn we could call him and he'd come check us in. Always had a nice room and love the service from everyone in the staff. The always make us feel welcome and at home. The Inn is in such a great spot. So close to everything. Can't wait to come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Kind and Welcoming Staff in Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: ead22
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a wonderful staff at the front desk and at the Orchid Bar. Everyone was friendly and acted like they cared about making your stay comfortable and enjoyable. The bathroom finishes were very nice. We stayed in the king suite. It was spacious and comfortable. The bar is charming and the continental breakfast exceeded expectations. We liked the location and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “An oasis just off Duval”
Reviews.Author: Fotofinder
Reviews.Content: This place has everything you could want in Key West or anywhere else. Beautiful rooms surrounding a small exquisite pool area, real quality furnishings in a beautifully kept property . Nice touch with free wifi and free happy hour drink. Nice continental breakfast and great welcome and restaurant advice from Kim. Being on Duval it is just a short walk straight down to Mallory square and the harbour with its many restaurants. See my review of Alonzo's restaurant - a recommendation from Kim. I should have stayed longer it was fabulous.

Reviews.Title: “Another satisfied customer!”
Reviews.Author: black325
Reviews.Content: I can't add much to what has already been said. It is a wonderful little oasis on a touristy street. Take advantage of Kim's dinner suggestions - both "nine one five" and "2 cents" provided wonderful dining experiences. Kim, along with Brandon and Sean provided excellent service throughout our stay. As others have stated, the expanded continental breakfast was just enough to start the day. (while I usually avoid the carbs, I did indulge in the cinnamon bread. Put it in the toaster, add some syrup and you have a great French toast!). I was a bit concerned with the location of our room - the first one on the street side. Didn't hear much road noise, but did have a problem with the wake up call by the roosters and on our final a.m. the digging up of the street by the city (neither of which were the motel's fault and for which we were compensated). I only mention this to suggest that you ask for a room on the inside around the pool area.

Reviews.Title: “Down to earth and nice!”
Reviews.Author: DCgirl703
Reviews.Content: I want to rate this place 4.5 - but wasn't sure how to do that. My sister and I went to Key West for the wine and food festival and to just hang out. The accommodations were nice and the breakfast and happy hour were good. What really stayed with me though was Brandon's friendship and helpfulness and Kim's advice on places to go. They were both great. I even told my sister that if I lived in Key West, Brandon would be my new best friend! I really appreciated his honesty and advice about what to do around the island (and what not to do). In fact, while we had come there for the wine and food festival, Brandon gave us the "low down" on the event from past years, and he couldn't have been more spot on! Brandon made us feel very special, but he was actually that way with all of the guests. Nonetheless, I have been to Key West twice in the last three years. And the first time, I stayed at the Marquesa - which was amazing for accommodations. But the Orchid Key is tops in my book for people just treating you so kindly. It is a great spot to meet locals (at their small bar). The accommodating are definitely nice, but I appreciated the people aspect even more!

Reviews.Title: “A beautiful room”
Reviews.Author: NickyWLondon
Reviews.Content: Driving down the keys past all the standard tacky roadside fare, Key West is an absolute oasis at the end of the road. It was with great relief we drove into this leafy little place bursting with character. The Orchid Key Inn did not disappoint either. The rooms are beautifully furnished and it felt like our own little luxury hideaway. Location is great for wandering about the town, but far enough away from the bars to get a good nights sleep. We had been on the road for so long that my husband forgot we had breakfast included so we missed out on that, although we did have a delicious breakfast at the French cafÃ© in town, just a shame we paid for it when we had one included!

Reviews.Title: “Made our holiday in Key West”
Reviews.Author: bugs1910
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel in Key West... Fab location on Duval Street but set back so no road noise.. Atmosphere is really chilled out.. Because of complementary breakfast and happy hour vouchers we spent no money on extras which was great!! Most rooms are facing the pool which is really nice.. The rooms in my opinion are furnished to a stunning standard, everything was of high quality from the extra large bed to the extra large TV and shower.. Luxury!!! We were expecting good things from the reviews we had read and the cost but our expectations were exceeded

Reviews.Title: “The Best Ever!”
Reviews.Author: Dixiedivine
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed here in September of 2011. I will admit to being biased when I saw the building thinking it was another crappy motel in Florida. As I am a 6th generation resident here, I know the game some people play on tourists. However, from the word go, our stay was wonderful. The front desk staff was the best. I absolutely love Brandon and wish I could have taken him home with me. The bar was the place to be and I made many new friends there and had some awesome drinks. The reality is that Key West is the place to party. Your hotel is not supposed to be the party place. I loved the fact that I could sit by the pool and actually read a book without a bunch of screaming kids doing dives right by the signs that say "no diving" as with other hotels. This was the place for grown-ups. It completely rejuvenated my spirits. My only regret was that we couldn't stay longer. I have never wanted to visit Key West before, but now that I have found this diamond in the rough, I am already planning my next trip. Give it a chance, this place and these people are what Florida used to always be about and they made me proud to call them friends!

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay in the Keys!”
Reviews.Author: Diane L
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay in the Keys - the Orchid Key Inn was very clean had very comfortable beds. The location was great - right on Duval Street - but the rooms were quiet when we went back at night. From the moment we arrived, Brandon (the front desk clerk) was so helpful and made sure he did everything to make our stay more enjoyable. If our travels ever take us back to the Keys - we will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Modern Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Christina A
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for a week. The location couldn't be better. The hotel is right on Duval St but also has a secluded feel with a private pool area. The rooms are well decorated and modern. They're reasonably sized for Key West. All the rooms have windows opening onto the courtyard or parking area, however, so you have to keep the curtains drawn all the time. Ask for a room overlooking the pool, not the parking lot. The staff are very friendly although they were unable to accommodate our late check out request.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location on Duval”
Reviews.Author: DentownTraveller
Reviews.Content: We really loved the staff and location. Try to get a room away from Duval Street, ours was right on the side of teh street and it was a little noisy at times. The room was great, the shower and bed were great. Nice happy hour everyday in a cute little bar. The pool and hot tub were great hangouts. Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: BB1985
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my partner for two nights during September 2011 and we were very impressed by this hotel. Service was great. Staff were very friendly and did anything they could to help you out. The room was nice. It was decent size, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was included with our stay and they even gave us vouchers for a free drink each during happy hour at the small bar by the pool. Location was great, right on Duval St, walking distance from just about anywhere you would want to go in Key West. Compared to other hotels in the area the price was very reasonable too. Overall I can highly recommend the Orchid Key Inn at Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Mary H
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to vacation. Rooms were clean and very attractive. Very friendly and helpful people behind the desk.. Brandon, the hotel manager was awesome. He made sure we had EVERYTHING we needed.The bartender was a little unfriendly and seemed bored with his job, but Brandon made up for that!! If ever in Key West again, this is where we will stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: Kristen M
Reviews.Content: This is a great place for couples. The staff is so friendly. This is the only place I will stay in Key West! We can't wait to go back. We were so impressed by the entire property. It's quaint and cozy and romantic.

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel!”
Reviews.Author: AlleyBaby
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Orchid Key Inn for 2 nights in early January, and we really liked this hotel...friendly, helpful staff, lovely fountains/pool/hot tub/bar. Everything was updated and attractive, and the wi-fi worked well. Rooms were a nice size, decorated in a style we enjoyed, had a little refrigerator that we kept things in. Music plays and people hang around the pool all day, but it's quiet at night. Great location on Duval Street, nice to be able to park and come/go as you please for $8/day. Breakfast was enough to get our day started. We will stay there when we go back to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “The only place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: Jerin W
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a wedding in May 2010. This was my 4th trip to Key West and had previously stayed @ the Sheraton (eeh, okay), Hyatt Vacation Club (nice but waaaaay expensive) and the Westwinds Inn (cute and cozy but a good walk to the stuff you want to see) and this is beyond the best place we've stayed. A short walk to the beach, a liquor store across the street, restaurants and bars galore all around, but somehow, it seems you're far away from that when you are here. The rooms are cute, the pool is small but never stays full, the happy hour poolside is such a nice touch. The poolside breakfast is good too. I love this place and will definitely stay here on any other trips we take down here. Oh, and I recommended this to a friend for her vacation and she couldn't believe how cute and fun this place was.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff, hotel slightly lacking in character”
Reviews.Author: CityGirlCH
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Orchid Key Inn for 5 nights in January 2012, and picked it because of Trip Advisor reviews. I have to reiterate that everything everyone said about the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff. Special thanks to Brandon on the front desk for his help and tall tales. The free drinks in the bar was a nice touch and all the barstaff always ready for a friendly chat. Having said that, here's why I wouldn't stay in the Orchid Key next time. Once you're inside the hotel you could be anywhere really - the pool is too small to swim in - the rooms not that special. Next time I would either go for one of the many guest houses in the streets north of the Orchid Key in one of the traditional wooden houses, where I could sit on a patio in the midst of lush vegetation in the garden.... OR I would pay that bit more and go for an ocean view room (east rather than west side of the island). None of that takes away from the service in the Orchid Key, and (if I go back) I would probably drop into the bar for a gin and juice!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, clean with nice little touches.”
Reviews.Author: TheSouthwickGrants
Reviews.Content: Had we realised how close to the hustle and bustle on Duval St we were, we probably would have been put off staying here. That would have been a mistake. Although very close to the action, it was a quiet location (except for the local cockerels). The nice touches of free WiFi and vouchers for drinks were a nice bonus. You do however pay to park, which I'd assume 90% of visitors would have to do! Breakfast is "continental" but substancial enough. The pool and loungers were nice and clean. The limited contact we had with the staff was very welcoming and informative. All in all Key West, is not cheap to do anything, but quirky and has some hidden gems on the food front off Duval St, so hunt around. Trip advisor points you to most if not all of them!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for Key West”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: Well done rooms with updated fixtures and electronics. Nice pool in courtyard and bar with fun happy hour on premises. Perfect location for Key West, as it is on the "quiet end" of Duval. Close enough to be within easy walking distance of the bars, but it's not very noisy when you want to retire for the night.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Fabulous !”
Reviews.Author: Barbara G
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights between Christmas and New Year's in the Junior Suite. The room was larger than expected and VERY upscale. Although the pool was right outside our door, we never heard any noise. Happy hour was a lot of fun; 2 free drinks, and Betty makes the best White Russians. Kim and Brendan were the nicest of all. Very helpful in booking the room and restaurant reservations. Plenty of parking. The grounds are so quiet and peaceful. Hard to believe this is right on Duval.

Reviews.Title: “perfect spot!”
Reviews.Author: Caryn163
Reviews.Content: This inn sits in the perfect spot for walking everywhere. Park your car and let it sit. It's quiet at night and right where you want to be during the day. Some of the other places along Duval have parties going on all night but Orchid Key does not have that problem. The staff was incredibly nice and helpful -- if they give you a suggestion for a restaurant, take it! We had one of the best meals ever at a little place off the beaten track that was recommended to us. The inn's breakfast was great, including the coffee. The rooms were very nice, but you won't spend a lot of time in the room because there is so much to do and see. Having a cocktail at the pool after a day's exploring just topped it off. I took my Mom, who had never been to Key West, and she was delighted with everything, and believe me, she is one picky person.

Reviews.Title: “A gem!”
Reviews.Author: Cari715
Reviews.Content: This was our second time at this hotel and it is wonderful! Excellent location, lovely grounds and room. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Great little bar with Betty, the fabulous bartender - the Georgia Peach martini was to die for! Will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and outstanding service!”
Reviews.Author: DeeEss
Reviews.Content: We decided to spend New Year's weekend at the Orchid Key Inn based on the positive reviews posted here, and the hotel exceeded our expectations in every way. The location is perfect -- right on Duval St at Truman Ave, walking distance to everything, but the rooms are away from the street and the noise. The rooms and the property are attractive and nicely done. The staff was great, especially Brandon at the front desk and Cathy at the bar. Here's a example of the quality of the staff: When we returned home, I realized that I had left a couple of envelopes on the bed with souvenirs and credit card receipts (my wife uses the souvenirs to make collages of places we visit). I figured they would be thrown away when the room was cleaned, but I called the hotel to ask if by any chance the housekeeper had turned them in. She hadn't, but Brandon went through the dumpster looking for these envelopes (unfortunately he didn't find them). I couldn't believe Brandon (or anyone) would offer to do this for souvenirs and credit card receipts -- it's not like I lost a wedding ring. Whatever they're paying Brandon, it's not enough! We will definitely stay at the Orchid Key Inn the next time we visit Key West, and I highly recommend that you consider doing the same.

Reviews.Title: “December holiday”
Reviews.Author: 1811laura
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel for 2 nights in December with my husband and two teenagers. The room was clean, comfy bed, lovely decoration, lots of nice touches - happy hour, wicker pool loungers, cool water mixed with fresh fruit outside reception, breakfast... The staff were helpful, cheerful and attentive. We hadn't prebooked this hotel, we just popped in in passing - lucky find. Didn't need the car for 2 days, easy walking distance to everything

Reviews.Title: “Holiday bliss”
Reviews.Author: presh j
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Orchid Key Inn for 3 days during the 2011 holiday season. Sure, Key West is awesome, but Orchid Key Inn took our vacation to the next level. The friendliest, most responsive staff you'll meet anywhere, and a quiet, peaceful, relaxing stay, even for light sleepers like me. This was probably the biggest, best surprise, given the nearby pool and sweet, hoping location on Truman and Duval. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “A little oasis in bustling Key West”
Reviews.Author: P W
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful little gem amidst the honky tonk of Key West. This lovely little property is just off Duval and about 10 blocks from the waterfront, adding to its tranquility and peace. Extremely well-appointed rooms and lush courtyard with pool. Everything is super clean and calming. The complimentary happy hour at the tiny, chic bar doesn't hurt either. Kim Q at the front desk was a delight. She provided us with great restaurant recommendations and set us up for a memorable booze cruise in the Christmas boat parade! We are making plans to return next year.

Reviews.Title: “Quaint, Beautiful and Welcoming!”
Reviews.Author: Carolpro
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay! The Captain and I couldn't have dreamed of a more beautiful, warm, and wonderful experience on our week-long trip to Key West! The staff, Brandon, Kim and Betty, among others were always so accommodating. Whatever we needed, they made it happen! Special thanks to Brandon for the great restaurants he suggested! Happy hour was always fun, and Betty made sure you were taken care of! The continental breakfast was always a lifesaver, especially after the long nights on Duval Street! We'll definitely stay here again! Thank you again Orchid Key Inn for making our stay in Key West so memorable! Paul and Carol Mt. Pleasant, MI

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful and serene place to stay”
Reviews.Author: bjztar
Reviews.Content: I selected this hotel based on reviews and ratings found on Trip Advisor, and I was not disappointed. I had called in my reservation to Kim and when we checked in, she remembered that I had mentioned it was my husband's 50th birthday. She made sure we had the largest king room they had available, and was so genuinely friendly and helpful. Another reason I selected the Orchid Key was the decor - it's so relaxing and spa-like. We enjoyed our free drink every evening before heading off to enjoy Key West, and we also took advantage of the hot tub after a long day of biking around town. My only two minor negative comments are: 1) the rug in our room was a bit dirty and the silk orchid in the bathroom had quite a bit of dust on it. (I'm sure if I had mentioned it to Kim, it would have been taken care of right away, but it wasn't that big of a deal to me.) 2) lack of drawer space to put folding clothes, like bathing suits, tee-shirts and shorts. Other than that, we both really enjoyed the relaxing atmosphere of the entire inn and hope to stay here again on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great Inn to stay at”
Reviews.Author: DoreenMcd
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just recently stayed at this small Inn. We had a fabulous experience. When we arrived the place was beautifully decorated with Christmas decorations. Most of the rooms are around the pool which had a tropical decor. This Inn was beautiful, quiet, and very clean. Breakfast in the morning was great. The staff was awesome. You must meet Brandon - he is very funny, sociable and informative. Betty made a fabulous drink called Betty Blue Orchid which you must try. She is very sweet and also informative. There are other staff members that are also wonderful that we met - Kim, Sean, Ms. D, and Trudi. we did not have as much interaction with them but when we did they were very sweet. Maye Rosa cleaned our room and did a great job. I highly recommend staying here. We will definitely be back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, quaint, reasonably priced hotel in the heart of Key West”
Reviews.Author: Steve U
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orchid Key Inn in December, 2011. We stumbled upon the quaint, immaculately kept small hotel. The rooms were clean and very tastefully decorated. The service was beyond reproach. The pool, spa, and small bar area were elegant and truly delightful. We checked in for one night and stayed for three. Fountains throughout the property helped hide the fact that this quaint and beautiful property is right on Duval Street. Within a 75 foot walk from our room, we were in the heart of the Key West action. If there is one place to stay in Key West that won't bankrupt your budget and offer you a tranquil and relaxing stay, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “One of a Kind”
Reviews.Author: ByFarr
Reviews.Content: When we turn up to the Orchid I wasn't sure if trip advisor review were right about this place, we stayed 3 nights at the start of November & this hotel had a wonderful un-natural feel about it the vibe is amazing. We check-in got to our room & it went from there, the room was awesome, large & two steps from the pool, spa and bar. Including welcome drinks for everyday we stayed & plus the bed was very comfortable & waking up to a great selection for the breakfast letâ€™s you start the day in the right mood. Great hotel would love to stay again one day.

Reviews.Title: “Great old Florida experience.”
Reviews.Author: artistNewHampshire
Reviews.Content: We stayed for four days during Thanksgiving week. The staff was friendly and caring from Kim at the front desk to the staff who manned the bar and breakfast buffet. The room was small but nicely updated floor, bathroom and bed. The pool area had comfortable lounge chairs, complimentary beach towels, a hot tub with a waterfall and fountains surrounding the grounds. They offered morning newspapers, complimentary drinks and cheese and crackers in the afternoons. The place is laid out like a "60's" motel and while you have to pay for parking there are two exits so it is easy to get to Duval ST. or head elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely boutique hotel..”
Reviews.Author: cynthiaBocaRaton_Fl
Reviews.Content: The Orchid Key Inn is spotlessly clean with so many luxury amenities at an affordable price. The staff is very helpful with reservations, free drink coupons and making you feel at home. The hotel provides a very good continental breakfast and happy hour. The best part is that this is a pet-friendly hotel and they really mean it!! The location on Duval is within perfect walking distance to everywhere...

Reviews.Title: “Nice...not great!”
Reviews.Author: Theetiquettorialist
Reviews.Content: Nice place but we probably were unlucky (I hope!) with the cleanliness: Sheets had not neen changed and they had just reversed the duvet so...was not excited about that. But the location is great.

Reviews.Title: “Look no farther”
Reviews.Author: Senior2004
Reviews.Content: If you desire to be close to the action of Duval Street, yet want to feel like you're far from the hubbub, this is your place. We recently spent 4 wonderful days there, and couldn't have asked for a better experience. Shawn and the rest of the staff were outstanding in service, the grounds were immaculate, and the setting was lovely. The Inn is a renovated 1950's era motel, but the well-appointed and tasteful rooms were every bit 2010. A center courtyard with bar, pool, and jacuzzi gives you a special isolated feel from the outside world. Grab a drink, soak in the jacuzzi and look up at the stars - you'll know you made the right choice. :)

Reviews.Title: “Everything was perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Amfalso
Reviews.Content: Our first time staying at this great hotel. What a fantastic place to stay. From the warm welcome to the time we left, this place exceeded expectations. The room was well decorated and very clean.....the linens were top quality, the a/c quiet and cool, and the place was very quiet. Perfect location right on Duval. The attention to detail was evident everywhere we looked. I tend to be very critical, but I really found every aspect of this wonderful place to be top notch. It will be my regular spot in Key West from now on.

Reviews.Title: “Second visit, even better than the first!”
Reviews.Author: slickllh
Reviews.Content: We returned to the Orchid Key Inn for the last part of our Honeymoon just before Thanksgiving, and we're very glad that we did. Kim at the front desk was awesome. She helped us with dinner suggestions and made reservations for us. Betty and Michael in the bar are fantastic! The daily cocktail specials were sooo tasty. The hotel itself is really nice, everything is updated and comfy. Rooms and the hotel grounds are maintained very well. It's really a perfect place to call home base while you're in Key West, if you don't mind being at the quieter end of Duval. Every time we go to Key West, we make a bunch of new friends, both locals and other travelers, and it just makes us want to come back again that much sooner.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous stay”
Reviews.Author: jillyv
Reviews.Content: What can i say that hasn't already been said? My husband and I stayed here for four nights in October this year. Having stayed in key West on several other occassions in various hotels. I can honestly say this was the best hotel we have stayed in down there, and we WILL be back. Everyone is so friendly, and the rooms are exceptional. Well appointed with comfortable bed, luxurious bathroom (I have never had so many towels provided in any hotel room), and spotlessly clean. We stayed in a suite, which although close to Duval St was quiet, and very spacious. The pool area could be a million miles from Duval and Truman, it is so peaceful. Unfortunatly for us the unusually very wet weather prevented us from making as much use of this area than we would have liked. Breakfast choice is more than adequate, and the chilled water by the pool is a nice touch which evokes the attention to detail which guests experience here. The staff are all so friendly, and helpful. However, one person must be singled out for her exceptional service - Betty. The life and soul of the bar. All in all a wonderful stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great in town location”
Reviews.Author: GreattimeNov2011
Reviews.Content: We stayed here over the Tgiving week in 2011 and had a blast. The staff was very helpful.....,especially Betty at the bar. Can't beat the location and our room was towards the back so we never heard Duval Street. We will stay there again!!! And maybe we'll get up in time for the breakfast!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A great find!”
Reviews.Author: Michelle H
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to the Keys for years and this place will be one of those places we return to - loved it!! The combination of beautiful clean rooms, relaxing grounds and a fantastic people make Orchid Key a true gem. Kim, Sean and Bettie were so helpful and pleasant and made our stay so nice. We will be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Of Everything!”
Reviews.Author: gunnelb0y
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay! The room was nice the bathroom even better. It was close to everything. The pool area was always a quiet place to recharge. We enjoyed our stay very much and can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great place and location”
Reviews.Author: rgp1963
Reviews.Content: Spent 4 days and enjoyed every minute. Location is on the south end of Duval which is out of the soup, yet within walking distance of everywhere in old town. It is a little pricy but what isn't on Duval. Also you tend to het what you pay for. The bar is quaint and enjoyable. My wife and I would deffinately return. Place is very romantic in its setting.

Reviews.Title: “SUPERB”
Reviews.Author: Janet5092
Reviews.Content: Clean and well maintained . Kim the day time manager is the best always sharing a friendly smile and great attitude and going above and beyond the call of duty to make our stay easy and most enjoyablable, Betty at the Orchid inn poolside bar also went above and beyond to make our stay feel like we were at home with great reccomendations and conversation. Both Kim and Betty saved our vacation by working so hard to get us into the Orchid Inn after we checked out of another place we thought was going to be a nice place but wasn't. Don't let me forget Brandon the night time manager was also very helpful and friendly and the breakfast lady also doing a wonderful job , even the maintenance man was a nice guy and very helpful . We are already looking to go back A.S.A.P. as both Kim and Betty and the entire staff made my wife and I feel like family and we already miss them. GREAT PLACE HAPPY HOLIDAYS Ray & Janet Parolari Bethlehem Township, New Jersey

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Ironcandle
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel the weekend of the 19th, and it was great. Kim got us checked in and did a great job of letting us know where things to do were located. Brandon was fun to talk to and had great insights on Key West and was ready to help with anything we needed. The hotel is located close enough to the action to walk, but far away enough to sleep. I know I will be staying here on the next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Stay of 2011”
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: We decided to visit Key West when the weather blew us out of Miami. So we arrived in town without any reservations. Found this spot and it was fantastic. The room felt very high end in the finishes. Very unique transformed motor hotel. Who ever did the interior design and pool area knocked it out of the park on this transformation. Included with the room was a complementary cocktail or beer afternoon of check in. Light breakfast and coffee included in the morning. This little extra allowed for interaction with other guests, which for me is a real plus. The pool was great and so was the hot tub. Parking was easy and the property is at a 50 yard line location on Duval Street. What's not to like. This was my favorite hotel that I dropped into this year! I'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: MarshManalapan_NJ
Reviews.Content: Right on Duval and Truman (Rt 1) is this lovely B&B tucked away and in walking distance to all the sites and fantastic restaurants and bars. Brandon and Kim are great, making sure everything you need is right there for you. The rooms are modern and have a microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator, flat screen TV and safe. Rooms sit poolside. Great free breakfast with choice of cereals, hard boiled eggs, bananas, muffins, danish, various toasts and multiple juice choices. Happy hour is from 5 to 7 and they give you a complimentary drink each day per person. Sun and/or shade around the pool and hot tub... nice for getting to know your neighbors. Brandon suggested 9-15 for one nights dinner.. FANTASTIC. Then Kim suggested Blue Heaven and Santiago's Bodega for the next two. Couldn't get better suggestions. Recommen this B&B highly.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: Annery M
Reviews.Content: We were referred to this hotel after our original hotel turned out to be unsuitable and the truth is they could not have been more accommodating. The room was had all the amenities one could need & though we didn't take advantage of it, they offer breakfast. A very good deal all around and the hotel is located within walking distance to great restaurants, bars & tourists attractions but you'll still sleep in peace. Hurray!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfy rooms, friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: LorieJen
Reviews.Content: We stayed Nov. 7-10. Weather was amazing! Kim checked us in and gave us an overview of the island and places to eat and things to do. She was always there with a smile on her face and happy to help with anything we needed. The room was perfect for my husband and I. King bed, flat screen tv, mini fridge, coffee maker, internet and contemporary bathrm. Some say small, I say cozy. Felt even more spacious with high ceilings. Nice large shower. The grounds are lovely. My husband said, "Melrose Place". The rooms surround the pool, hot tub and bar. Outside shower and soda machine. Complimentary breakfast is great (7-10). Happy hour (5 or 5:30 for 2hrs). I'm not sure if music is played all day or just during these times...was nice and relaxing to have in the background...but may wake you in the morning...bring ear plugs if light sleeper. Location is on Duval but surprisingly quiet, tranquil and private. A little closer to Atlantic Ocean but from one side of island to other is only approx 1.25miles. Easy to walk everywhere. May want bike, scooter or car to hit Higgs or Smathers beach and tour rest of island. Lots of places to eat, drink, shop, explore in walking distance...or lounge at Inn. Absolutely lovely! Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Froggie1974
Reviews.Content: Great hotel ,fantastic service and great rooms the total package, the drink voucher system has been changed whereby you can have drinks anytime during the day and the continental breakfast kept us going all day, situated in the quieter end of duval street so you're not kept awake at night by the party goers. Great value for money should be number 1 whilst there check out la creperie for lunch and santiago bodegas for diner.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, courteous and thoughtful staff”
Reviews.Author: Jim M
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for four nights last week as part of our 25th wedding anniversary vacation. The location of the Inn was perfect, the amenities were first-class, and the staff was excellent. The thoughtfulness of the staff was particularly evident when we returned to our room from dinner on the last night of our stay and found a bucket of ice holding a bottle of sparkling wine, and two champagne glasses adorned with a fresh cut orchid waiting for us. That was a nice touch and was representive of the type of service we received throughout our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and room”
Reviews.Author: Warings
Reviews.Content: Stayed here based on Tripadvisor and was very pleased. The motel is layed out like the old motor court type. The grounds are beautifully landscaped with a central, small swimming pool. They have a very small retro bar and a small hot tub. Around this the rooms form a square. The rooms are very well designed, with modern furnishings. The bathroom had a nice large shower and great glass tiles. The location is perfect, right in the middle of shops and restaurants. The only thing we really did not like were the very attractive, but incredibly uncomfortable lounge chairs around the pool. This was a big shame because we had hours to lay around and the weather was great.

Reviews.Title: “Kim Qualey”
Reviews.Author: Michael S
Reviews.Content: Checked in by Kim Qualey at the front desk of Orchid Key Inn. She was amazingly helpful in getting to know the city, the activities available, and helping me have the specific type of room I had requested over the phone. She went so far as to loan me her moped so that I could drive to the Verizon store in town after I lost my cell phone. Accommodating, friendly, and going above and beyond the usual standards of service one receives from the front office agent, she made my time at Orchid Key Inn relaxing and most enjoyable. The morning breakfast was superb and the afternoon/evening bar was great fun. The hotel is in a perfect location roughly half way between the two ends of Duval St., close to many nice restaurants, shops, and bars. I would recommend the Orchid Key Inn to anyone without reservation. The staff there is the best I have come across in many years of traveling the United States and abroad. I will stay there next October when I return to enjoy Key West !

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean and close to all the fun!”
Reviews.Author: ReetyPeet
Reviews.Content: My sister and I took a long weekend vacation here mid-October. Brandon at the front desk was welcoming, kind, and helpful. The rooms are nicely decorated and clean with beautiful bathrooms. Our room had nice amenities: mini-fridge, microwave, and big flat-screen tv. We only wished for dresser/drawer space, which there was really little of. The pool could be considered "small" but not too small for the size of the hotel. We liked the small/intimate feel of the hotel despite being right on Duval. Parking is convenient and on-property. We parked our car and had no need to use it all weekend as you can basically walk to all stores, bars, restaurants, activities etc. in less than 15 mins (max). This place is perfect for a fun and relaxing adult weekend. Perhaps not great for families with kids due more of a quiet, relaxing, adult-focused environment. Enjoy your stay! We did!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: mlshelby
Reviews.Content: The Orchid Key Inn was fun and in a great location......right across the street from the sight seeing train. Although our room was a little small, it was clean and very nicely appointed. The wine and cheese every afternoon was ann added surprise. I would be glad to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Happiness044
Reviews.Content: What a perfect place to stay, walking distance to everything. Kim,front desk,was friendly & informative. Rooms neat/clean. Betty,the bartender was Great,Happy hr. fun. Continental breakfast plentiful & delicious. Thanks to Orchi Key Inn for helping make our visit Wonderful. Chicagoland couple

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location for us”
Reviews.Author: lilirishstar
Reviews.Content: Great newly updated room with large flat screen TV. Great new large bathroom. Comfy bed and pillows. Friendly and helpful staff. Very nice continental breakfast. Nice pool/ bar area. Located on the quiet end of Duval. Across the street was the trolley stop. Very close to Hemingway House, Lighthouse (you can see it from pool area), Butterfly Conservatory, Seven Fish, Camille's, Banana Cafe', Kermit's on Duval, Flamingos Ice Cream. Two blocks from Bahama Village where the Goombay Festival was last week and where you go for Blue Heaven, Better than Sex Dessert, and so much more. Just a few blocks from Southernmost point, and a pleasurable walk down to Mallory Square. We had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Hildi H
Reviews.Content: Clean rooms, great staff, super location! Our king size bed was comfortable with lots of pillows. The staff is friendly, knowledeable and always going out of their way to make your visit the best possible. The Orchid Key Inn is NOT a big national chain. Because you are not just a number, the staff remembers you making your stay more personnal. Thank you Betty, Michael, Kim and everyone for making our stay at the Orchid Key in perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Orchid Key Oasis!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anthony C
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at this little oasis off Duval Street. Swank rooms, great courtyard with pool and hot tub. Attentive, friendly staff went way out of their way to be helpful and friendly. We have found our favorite vacation getaway spot......Can only describe as Awesome! We are thinking of planning our wedding here!

Reviews.Title: “perfect place to stay in key west”
Reviews.Author: RayMaryR
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently returned from a trip to Key West where we stayed at the Orchid Key Inn. Our stay there was wonderful. Everyone from check-in to check-out was great. Brandon, Kim and Trudy went over and above to make our stay enjoyable. They made us feel so comfortable from their friendly smiles to their exceptional service. The location proved to be perfect with easy access to everything. Everything about the hotel was beautiful. From the rooms to the pool to the bar. If you go to the Orchid Inn you must have a drink at the bar with Betty. She immediately made us feel like one of the family, and she was great fun to be around. We would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a small boutique hotel. It was a very enjoyable stay and we would return.

Reviews.Title: “Best Romantic place to stay in Key West.”
Reviews.Author: Frank F
Reviews.Content: For our 21 Wedding Anniversary I took My wife to Keywest .She had never been before .So I booked the entire trip and I am not a planner.I have been to the Keys at least 4 times in the past but never stayed at The Orchid Key Inn.The people there were Awesome !! ,we met Brandon first and he was very helpful.The room was Ritz Carlton material.So clean and tastefully decorated.We stayed for 2 nights but wish it would have been more.The bed (king size) are extremely comfortable. The breakfast bar is nice.(I generally do not do breakfast)but this was really nice.Enough to get you going.We walked alot but everything is very conveniently located.The Bars are far away that you do not hear the night life on Duval street.I would HIGHLY recommend staying here if you want a Romantic getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Impressive - Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: parrotheads427
Reviews.Content: This place is definately a hidden gem! This was our first trip to Key West and we're glad we stayed here. It has a perfect location and is a place we'd definately return to. The staff are fantastic, extremely helpful and very personable. They have great recommendations for things to do and places to eat. The room is comfortable and modern with great toiletries. The maid even left me make-up remover cloths. They even had a scale in the room which came in handy with weighing our bags to make sure we weren't going to pay the obnixous airline bag fees. The pool area is quaint and relaxing and madea wonderful setting for the continental breakfast. The only minor complaint would be that the bed was a bit uncomfortable/lumpy. Other than that, I can't say enough great things about The Orchid Key Inn - looking forward to returning there.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden gem of a little bar”
Reviews.Author: Tim C
Reviews.Content: I visit Key West often and always try to find a new, hidden bar to have a drink in. This place has a cool little (I mean 6 art deco seats small) pool bar with the best bartender Betty. She will totallly take care of you and make you smile. And also introduce you to some other people. Great time. Thanks Betty. PS. I didn't stay at the Inn but am looking forward to in the future

Reviews.Title: “We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: Trainer090909
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Key West and we took the advise of Tripadvisor and stayed at the Orchid Key Inn. We really loved our stay here and are planning on going back!. The place is small but has everything you need for a great stay. The rooms are decorated well with modern amenities. The bed was so comfortable and the shower was great. Overall quiet and intimate. Kim gave us great advice on where to go and things to do. Another girl (who was leaving for to go home the day after we arrived) told us the best places to eat. We are vegatarian and her suggestions were awesome. The hotel is close to everything and we enjoyed walking . I do recommend renting a scooter if you do not have a car. We really enjoyed ours and were able to come and go more freely.

Reviews.Title: “ok ... but would expect more for the price”
Reviews.Author: bwmmac
Reviews.Content: This place was okay in a good situation on Duval - quieter part away from all the racket at the top end - area around had some nicer "classier" restaurants and bars than you will find at the other end and everything was less brash I suppose. We liked that better. The property itself was fine and clean but a bit expensive for what you get - but should do better than polystyrene cups and paper plates for your breakfast in the morning. The pool - no good for swimming - more of a place to go take a cooling dip if you can find room - when there are two or three others in there, you don't want to be there. The staff fine - apart from one of the ladies at the bar - she could do with a refresher course in customer care. All in all was sufficient but not what you would term class. there have gotta be better places than this in Key West.

Reviews.Title: “We extended our stay......”
Reviews.Author: Burdocks
Reviews.Content: This is a modern, clean, friendly and quality hotel at the less noisy end of Duval Street. We initially planned to be there for a long weekend but liked it so much that we stayed for a whole week.

Reviews.Title: “TheOrchid Key WOWWWWWW”
Reviews.Author: Blanche_20120
Reviews.Content: I have been traveling to KW for over 25 yrs and only stayed "1" place TILL NOW "the Orchid Key " IS the hottest thing to hit this MECCA city is MANY years....THe staff/property/amenities/ are above and beyond....Brandon and Betty R jewels......This property needs to stay # 1 in KW for years GREAT STAY

Reviews.Title: “as expected, pretty good”
Reviews.Author: max_woof
Reviews.Content: we stayed here for a couple of nights in september while we explored key west. it's top pick on trip advisor (at least it was when we booked) and you can tell why - friendly staff; nice, clean rooms with wonderful shower and exceptionally comfy bed; welcome (if small) pool and whirlpool; nice bar with free (yay!) drinks and good value parking ($8 a day). the location couldn't have been better for us - on duvall street but towards the southern (quieter) end. if we returned to key west we'd definitely book the orchid key again.

Reviews.Title: “Great little oasis on Duval St”
Reviews.Author: JulzieJ1
Reviews.Content: Beautifully decorated rooms - and probably the comfiest bed I have ever slept on! Good location, right on Duval, although still a bit of a walk to the top end (but you get to walk past all the shops on the way so not all bad). Staff here were excellent, great local knowledge - gave us a great recommendation for a restaurant across the road - NineOneFive - you MUST eat here, we were travelling around for 7 weeks and this place was our best meal. The breakfast in the morning was good and nice to eat around the pool. We had a couple of free drink vouchers for the bar but didn't have time to use them! The pool was really cute and nice to hang out in, only slight negative was that it was SO hot, like a bath tub, but the ocean is just as hot - it was also the middle of a summer heat wave so was to be expected.

Reviews.Title: “Great Small hotel in Duval Street”
Reviews.Author: Justtravel100
Reviews.Content: My husband and I loved this hotel. It is private, quite, BUT conveniently located. We loved the decoration outside and inside the room. It is elegant and simple. Bed was confortable and bathroom was very clean. Breakfast space and tables were limited.

Reviews.Title: “You cannot go wrong staying here.”
Reviews.Author: Tabbywest
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Orchid Key twice. One in a King room and once in a Suite. For the extra money I would go with the Suite. The King room was small. Everything here is nicely decorated with a modern feel and the bathrooms are very nice. The staff does a great job keeping everything clean and has great recommendations for dinner and activities. The location is great, not too close to the crowds. We do not mind waking a few extra blocks for the quieter area. Now that the bar is open the happy hour is by coupon during two hours. This seemed kind of uncomfortable, there are patrons on the bar who are not hotel guests and you have to get the bartenders attention (the patrons all seemed to be her friends or at least she was deep in conversation with them) and then ask what you can get for this coupon. One day there was a friendly male bartender who made great drinks but the rest of the trip the female was behind the bar and after two days of "excuse me may I please get my free glass of wine if that is not too much trouble" we finally gave up on using the coupons and went over to 915 instead of bothering with the onsite bar again. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “It can't be this GOOD!”
Reviews.Author: Richard H
Reviews.Content: We selected the Orchid Key Inn because the tripadvisor reviews were so great. When we pulled in the parking lot I had second thoughts...it looked like a small non discript inn! We were there for our 25th anniversary and wanted it to be great...it was not...it was better than great. The room was beautiful and spotless..but we have stayed in many places like that...what was so special was the staff. There was NOTHING they would not do for you. I would like to give special note to Kim an Shawn..both staff at the check in desk. They made this Inn at a 24 room facility better than on par with a Ritz or Four Seasons...Key West style. We will be back and tell all our friends to go for one of ther best experiences ever.

Reviews.Title: “Quite Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Mochi00
Reviews.Content: Great Service and great hospitality. It is located right on Duval Street on the quieter side. Everything is conveniently close by. Ice cream store, Conch Train stop and Cafes were a few steps away. Walking around town and going back to the hotel was a breeze. Hotel was very clean, the room we got was a King Suite and it was above our expectation.It was nice to eat breakfast poolside and also get free drinks during Happy Hour. There were always fresh towels at the pool chairs and replaced quickly. Kim and Brendan were quite helpful and superb.My husband and I truly enjoyed our stay at the Orchid Inn.

Reviews.Title: “One Nite Was Not Enough”
Reviews.Author: duckrylee
Reviews.Content: This was a really awesome place to stay. The location was perfect for shopping and night life, the service so very friendly, the bar and pool area beautiful, and the rooms were perfect in everyway (linens, towels, comfort, very pretty & super clean), I have never been so pleased at our choice in a hotels. Thank you, The Whitakers, Sept. 13th, 2011

Reviews.Title: “Best customer service!”
Reviews.Author: joeyrn
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, right on Duval where all the shops and bars are but still quiet and peaceful. Walking distance to all the attractions and the water. Great staff, excellent service. They helped us with everything we needed, answered all questions and were very knowledgable. The hotel was clean, the bar area was nice and they had a great little breakfast. The rooms were small, but had everything you might possibly need and they were comfortable and beautiful! There was on site parking, it was a little small- hard to park if u had a bigger vehicle, but still manageable. We would stay there again- it was perfect!

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: aroehrig
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel! It has newly remodeled rooms and is in a great location near the downtown area. The owner was very friendly and extremely helpful. There is a bar by the pool which has a great little happy hour. The bartender was also very friendly and pointed us in the direction of some great restaurants in Key West. Unless you want to be right on the beach, you really cannot go wrong with this hotel. I went with my boyfriend for a scuba diving/Thanksgiving getaway and I would stay at Orchid Key Inn again any day!

Reviews.Title: “what a wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: fieldops
Reviews.Content: we arrived and were greeted and checked into a beautiful room. the rooms are small but probably one of the cleanest and well appointed rooms I've ever stayed in. we stayed for 3 nights and were treated like royalty the entire stay. the staff are superb and take every opportunity to speak with you and ask if there is anything they can do (and they mean it) the pool area is quiet and clean (the hotel is on the quiet end of Duval) and the small hotel bar is big on character with a super lady named Betty making you strong tasty drinks. Kim at the front desk is a delight to talk with and her personality was as warm as the key west sunshine. if you want a stay in Key West to remember stay here at the Orchid Key Inn. the entire staff will make you glad you did

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: RODMAROE
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here to celebrate her birthday and she (and I) loved the hotel. It's small with a very private feel and is in a fantastic location. It's on Duval but at the opposite end from Sloppy Joe's and all the rowdyiness. The pool was very nice and the bar is conveniently located close to the pool. Breakfast is easy self serve in the morning. The Hemingway House and other museums are within easy walking distance. The only potential problem is parking. However, I recommend parking and renting a bike or scooter to get around Key West. The check in and check out was very easy and the staff were all very friendly and helpful. We look forward to staying here again when in key West.

Reviews.Title: “Location”
Reviews.Author: mdmd44
Reviews.Content: Awesome place to stay right in the heart of Key West on Duval Street. The pool being open 24 hours is the best hotel amenity ever.

Reviews.Title: “Love at first sight!”
Reviews.Author: TimeTrvlr4
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I found this sweet little gem on Duval! It's clearly an earlier built motel that has been renovated at GREAT expense and with attention to detail. It fits perfectly into the charm of Old Key West. My husband and I went to KW to celebrate my 50th birthday and it was just as many other reviewers have already stated. Checked in with Sean and found the room to be plenty roomy enough, clean and comfortable. The room was not enormous but quaint and "spa-like" in decor and vibe. The room included a refrigerator, full sized coffee pot, microwave, lovely bath robes, hair dryer, fluffy towels and really nice toiletries. The large flat panel television on the wall was nice too! We didn't spend much time in the room except for sleeping (the bed was awesome!) because we were out by the pool, sight-seeing, or enjoying the drinks at the Orchid Key Bar. Betty and Andrew were our bartenders and they were exceptional. Pay special attention to Betty's Georgia Peach Martini. It's delicious and she's a sweetheart. In the mornings from 7 to 10 am, the continental breakfast was substantial and was set up in the Orchid Key Bar. Plenty of offerings and it was nice to grab a tray, get some coffee, and walk a few steps to the pool to enjoy a lovely morning while perusing the Key West Citizen newspaper. We had the pleasure of getting to know Brandon and Kim at the front desk and they provided exceptional service to us, giving us insider tips as local residents of the area. They treated us like long time friends. The location was ideal for us and surprisingly quiet, it's hard to believe this inn is on Duval. It's on the more quiet side of Duval, but everything was within walking distance. If you go, don't miss having a meal at Sweet Tea's. It's about two blocks away and we thank Brandon for recommending it. We ate there twice. Most important, take time to do the Danger Charters Wind and Wine cruise. Lovely sunset, great wine, small group. Thanks to Kim for suggesting it. It was a perfectly lovely birthday and I will never forget it. To my new friends at Orchid Key Inn, Melissa and Bill will be back!

Reviews.Title: “A real jewel in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: DrLarryG
Reviews.Content: We spent a few days at the Orchid Key Inn for my wife's birthday in June and were thrilled with both the accommodations and the staff. We wanted an upscale room in the heart of Key West and loved this little Inn. We walked to every restaurant and usually took our Soft Coated Wheaten canine "daughter" with us. Private parking right in front of our room was a huge plus and the rooms are newly remodeled with a touch or elegance. We look forward to a return visit at this little gem.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Paradise in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: Kristen D
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orchid Key Inn during our first trip to Key West. It was absolutely everything we could have asked for and more! Brandon and Kim at the front desk were amazing. My husband and I asked for restaurant tips and ideas of places to go; they always had the best suggestions and were so helpful and gracious. The room was so comfortable! They provide you with Bath and Body Works soaps, shampoo, and conditioner. Those were such a nice touch! The maids did a wonderful job everyday, and we always had enough towels and linens. The pool area was awesome! We spent lots of time hanging out there, and the other guests were so friendly as well. We found that it was mostly couples at the hotel, but there were also several families as well. The bar by the pool was great, and so were all the bartenders! You get free drink coupons for each day, but the bartenders were so kind to us and brought us out other drinks during the heat of the day so we could enjoy them! What a nice treat and what lovely people! The grounds were beautifull kept and everything was done in the tropical decor you would expect. The location (right on Duval) was wonderful. You were close to so many bars and restaurants, yet we never heard anything like voices or traffic when we were trying to sleep at night. Overall, this was a fantastic vacation. I am so grateful that, because of Trip Advisor, we found Orchid Key Inn. We would definitely stay there again anytime we go back to Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Easily the best hotel in Key West”
Reviews.Author: xrachrox
Reviews.Content: My fiancÃ© and I just adore this hotel! Try the "Gin + Juice", the house signature cocktail with Hendricks Gin, Fresh Cucumber + Grapefruit Juice...Delish!!

Reviews.Title: “Pictures don't lie...absoultely perfect!”
Reviews.Author: GrlLuvs2HavFun
